name: Rasta Noide
description:
A ship game in the Arrow Flash style.

The project is in production
So far the game has:

-Three Stages
- LANGUAGES: English, Spanish and Portuguese.
-Gamepad suport

Commands:

A - shoot
Z - Turbo
SPACE - Special
ENTER - Pause game

In the menu:
A - change the language
S - see commands on gamepad
